activities.title: Smart India Hackathon 2024 – Winner
activities.description: Participated under the team name "Sahvrindam." Won through a wildcard entry at IIT Tirupati.

activities.title: Smart India Hackathon 2023 – Winner
activities.description: Won for Problem Statement 1473: Boosting Tourism using VR, sensors, Arduino, and UI design. Overcame technical challenges like a last-minute laptop crash.
activities.achievement: 1st Prize Winner, Government of India-recognized SIH 2023

activities.title: Mindspark Mini Hackathon – Winner
activities.description: Participated in Mindspark Mini Hackathon at MVPS's KBT College of Engineering, Nashik. Developed a solution for EV charging station power management under time constraints with presentation and prototype.

activities.title: KKWIEER Fest – 2x Wins
activities.description: Participated in business plan, imposter escape, and reel-making competitions during college fest.
activities.achievement: Winner in two events, with certificates and cash prize

activities.title: Secured 3rd Rank – First Semester
activities.description: Recognized for strong academic performance in the 1st semester.
activities.achievement: 3rd rank in class; received book reward

activities.title: NASA Space Apps Challenge 2024 – Global Nominee
activities.description: Represented Nashik region at global level with team "Musical Aliens."

activities.title: EY Techathon 5.0
activities.description: Advanced to Round 2 of EY Techathon 5.0 with a remote team. Worked under pressure with limited time and slides.

activities.title: Bit N Build Hackathon – Top 30
activities.description: Developed a Smart Inventory & Waste Reduction System using MERN stack at 24-hour web dev hackathon by GDSC-CRCE.

activities.title: Webathon at M.H. Saboo Siddik College Of Engineering
activities.description: Advanced through Round 1 with an innovative idea and successfully implemented and presented it in Round 2. Engaged with industry experts, explored Mumbai, and gained valuable experience.
activities.achievement: Qualified till final round, presentation well-received by panel

activities.title: Finalist in Tech-Trek by GDSC KKWIEER
activities.description: Participated in a tech-based challenge organized by GDSC and reached the final round.

activities.title: Google Cloud Arcade Advanced Milestone
activities.description: Completed the Google Cloud Arcade journey and unlocked the Advanced Milestone, receiving rewards including hoodie, backpack, mug, pen, etc.

activities.title: Google Cloud Study Jams – Goodies Received
activities.description: Completed Google Cloud Skills Boost Study Jams organized by GDSC.
activities.achievement: Received exclusive goodies from Google Cloud

activities.title: First Open Source Contribution – MindsDB Swag
activities.description: Contributed to the MindsDB project and was recognized for the effort.
activities.achievement: Received official MindsDB swag and community recognition

activities.title: Innovation Design Entrepreneurship Bootcamp (IDE Bootcamp Phase 3)
activities.description: Represented Team AGRATAS at a 5-day innovation bootcamp organized by MIC, AICTE, and Wadhwani Foundation at NIT Goa. Learned from industry leaders and visited FiRE incubation center.
activities.achievement: National representation, networked with top mentors and innovators

activities.title: LinkedIn Profile Setup Session for Juniors
activities.description: Organized a hands-on session to guide juniors on creating professional LinkedIn profiles and understanding the importance of networking.
activities.achievement: Mentored peers and helped shape their professional journeys

activities.title: Git & GitHub Hands-on Session – MIBCS Hacktoberfest
activities.description: Conducted an open-source session covering Git basics, GitHub workflow, and collaborative development.

activities.title: Idealab Design Thinking Workshop – Volunteer
activities.description: Volunteered at a design thinking session focused on creative problem-solving.

activities.title: AI Unplugged Event – Volunteer
activities.description: Volunteered at an AI and ML event hosted by ML Nashik. Co-anchored, managed the event, created content, and mentored students on SIH.

activities.title: Consolation Prize at Sunhacks 2k24 – Skill Swift
activities.description: Built an AI-ML powered resume filtering website named "Skill Swift" with team Pyyoneers.
activities.achievement: Consolation Prize, Top 3 in Web Dev Domain
